revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|xanthophyll|ous}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # Of or relating to [[xanthophyll]]. #* '''2003''', Ludwik Frey, ''Problems of grass biology'' (page 203) #*: The impact of '''xanthophyllous''' dyes on the overall colour of plants is negligible, as they occur in very small quantities. #* '''2008''', Catherine A. Culver, Ronald E. Wrolstad, ''Color Quality of Fresh and Processed Foods'' (page 104) #*: White and yellow flesh potato have '''xanthophyllous''' carotenoids. Yellow color intensity is a determinant of xanthophyll content up to a point.
